content:
Hey, why might my local index be found in 

~/.cargo/registry/index/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/.cache/

instead of 

~/.cargo/registry/index/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/

?
I guess to be more specific, I'm trying to use https://crates.io/crates/crates-index to get the index info for an arbitrary crate and the source doesn't appear to be in the expected location
Cargo uses the bare git repo directly. It does not have a checkout. https://github.com/frewsxcv/rust-crates-index/issues/17
